column3:
Every year passes but the pain remains the same 😞

It's more painful when you have to struggle silently and the world is busy enjoying the life... 
Having no emotional support is more than PAIN... #MentalHealthMatters #loneliness #Suicide #depression
#WorldMentalHealthDay

In this life, I can't expect things to be in my favor. If I take a break I'll go back to nothing and no one. 

I feel misplaced like a turtle in a horse race.

▫️▫️▫️

#life #Anxiety #loneliness

#Loneliness is striking hard these days. Online friends help a bit, but nothing beats a face to face relationship. Over 2 months without therapy has not helped. Therapist has canceled twice on me. Rare to happen once, but twice? She's burned out, so probably won't be around long

I have been heartbroken 💔 She left me.
She doesn't want me anymore. I lost love.

#Loneliness. It's not just being alone. We can be surrounded by people and still feel lonely. And it's a killer. Great discussion about this in @Atlantic's "How to Build a Happy Life" podcast with @arthurbrooks and @Surgeon_General. Wonder what JHU folks are doing in this realm?

 Disappointed.

Just jusjointed with the world today. Not having a great time.

I think about this quote often:

"When nobody wakes you up in the morning, and when nobody waits for you at night, and when you can do whatever you want. What do you call it, freedom or loneliness?" - Charles Bukowski

#Freedom
#loneliness

If you've never dealt with #depression, for me at least, it's like I have the flu without the cough, with the addition of fog brain, emotional waves, intolerability, lethargy, guilt, #loneliness, all bundled up into a ball of #fuck. It can come in waves, or last for months+

Loneliness is not when you don't have loved ones in life,
it's not having someone in your life who truly gets you.

#Loneliness #writer #writerslift #WritingCommunity

If you are reading this and are struggling with your mental health.

Please know that reaching out for help is often the first stage of recovery and the bravest thing you can do. 

Things will get better, we promise 💜
